title: Low priority queue
body: Recently i got put into the low priority queue, it takes 20 minutes just to join the queue and then this afternoon, I was waiting for the low priority queue to end and when it did i joined the normal queue like usual, put into a game where someone left the champion selection screen at around 1minuteish of waiting for a game, i continue waiting for around 10 minutes, so i left queue thinking it must have some sort of bug after the first champion selection, and when i had rejoined queue i had to wait another 20 minutes, this timing is outrageous and needs to be lowered to 5 minutes or something reasonable or we wait in the low queue and when the low queue timing has ended and we don't get a game or we leave queue. We don't have to wait another 20 minutes just for another game. on behalf of everyone everyone on the low priority queue that actually want to play the game.

replies.body:
It's really buggy at the moment.
It is low priority for a reason. Don't get leaver busted and then you can enjoy normal que times.
